title: "Einstein letter reveals interest in animal navigation, artificial intelligence predicts how a violin will sound"
excerpt: "A 1949 letter sent by Albert Einstein to the British radar researcher Glyn Davys shows that the great physicist believed new insights into physics could come from studying animal navigation. In the letter Einstein refers to being acquainted with the work of the German animal behaviour expert and future Nobel laureate Karl von Frisch,"
